1.content:
It's been a month since your first year of college started and you've been having a good time. Your roommate, Nick, is a member of the swim team and has the body to prove it. You admit to be jealous of his body when compared to your scrawny form. But one day when you're working on homework in your room, you hear a ringing noise in your ears that's deafening. In your mind you hear a voice saying:
"You're the perfect candidate for my experiment! Enjoy the ability to swap traits between members of your sex! So if you want to swap any trait, mental or physical, just concentrate on the targets. I recommend two, three at maximum, for best results. Enjoy!"
After that the ringing stops and you regain your bearings.
"That was weird" you mumbled.
So what do you do?
1.title: The beginning

11.content:
If I want to test my power out either I use it on myself or I find someone else to test it on...

info.brief_description: You're in college and find out about an ability to swap body traits with other males.
info.description:
Your name is Eli and you just entered college. Your roommate is awesome to you. You've made new friends and have discovered that you have a gift.

Please keep all swaps between males and feel free to add new characters. Also please no deaths.

Feel free to add chapters!
